entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 7:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 30 %
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
